attributes.additional_details: As a public sector worker my pay has been frozen for 2 years. Then what do we get? A 1% pay rise! The same year MP's receive an 11% pay rise! They state savings need to be made due to the deficit. They do not lead by example...expenses scandle aside! Sign this petition to freeze MP pay and subject them to a pay freeze they have given everyone else!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for government
